text: White House operatives went to great lengths to show Obama shifting focus from wars abroad to domestic issues at home.
author: Ron Fournier

text: Akron, Ohio, is my home. It will always be remembered. Akron, Ohio, is my life.
author: LeBron James

text: Survival requires us to leave our prejudices at home. It's about doing whatever it takes - and ultimately those with the biggest heart will win.
author: Bear Grylls

text: Many working mothers feel guilty about not being at home. And when they are there, they wish it could be perfect. This pressure to make every minute happy puts working parents in a bind when it comes to setting limits and modifying behavior.
author: Cathy Rindner Tempelsman

text: Women are the victims of this patriarchal culture, but they are also its carriers. Let us keep in mind that every oppressive man was raised in the confines of his mother's home.
author: Shirin Ebadi

text: The words that a father speaks to his children in the privacy of home are not heard by the world, but, as in whispering galleries, they are clearly heard at the end, and by posterity.
author: Jean Paul

text: We are not about to send American boys 9 or 10 thousand miles away from home to do what Asian boys ought to be doing for themselves.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

text: If your neighbors think you're a detective because a cop always brings you home, you might be a redneck.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

text: I believe my woman shouldn't work outside the home.
author: Oliver Reed

text: I've spent lots of time in London, I studied in London, I like London. It's just not my home.
author: Johnny Vegas

text: I never married because there was no need. I have three pets at home which answer the same purpose as a husband. I have a dog which growls every morning, a parrot which swears all afternoon, and a cat that comes home late at night.
author: Marie Corelli

text: The average husband enjoys the total effect of his home but is usually unable to contribute any of the details of work and organisation that make it enjoyable.
author: Havelock Ellis

text: Akron, Ohio, is my home. I will always be here. I'm still working out at my old high school.
author: LeBron James

text: I never come back home with the same moral character I went out with something or other becomes unsettled where I had achieved internal peace some one or other of the things I had put to flight reappears on the scene.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

text: If they had a social gospel in the days of the prodigal son, somebody would have given him a bed and a sandwich and he never would have gone home.
author: Vance Havner

text: Analogies, it is true, decide nothing, but they can make one feel more at home.
author: Sigmund Freud

text: A sold-out house my first night back. Do you have any idea what kinda pressure that is? I could have been at home in my warm bed, playing Nintendo.
author: Richard Pryor

text: It's silly talking about how many years we will have to spend in the jungles of Vietnam when we could pave the whole country and put parking stripes on it and still be home by Christmas.
author: Ronald Reagan

text: The only way you can have it all is by delegating all the running of the home to other people - which I don't ever want to do... So you do it yourself, and it takes time and energy and effort. And if you give it the time, it's profoundly enjoyable.
author: Emma Thompson

text: Acting is probably the greatest therapy in the world. You can get a lot stuff out of you on the set so you don't have to take it home with you at night. It's the stuff between the lines, the empty space between those lines which is interesting.
author: Robert Carlyle

text: You never know what events are going to transpire to get you home.
author: Og Mandino

text: Most children threaten at times to run away from home. This is the only thing that keeps some parents going.
author: Phyllis Diller

text: Bad psychoanalysis would say I enjoyed pleasing people, working really hard and pleasing people, which is probably related to my father in some way. But I really liked working hard. When I worked at Disneyland, I'd do 12 hours straight and go home thrilled.
author: Steve Martin

text: A home without books is a body without soul.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: My father probably thought the capital of the world was wherever he was at the time. It couldn't possibly be anyplace else. Where he and his wife were in their own home, that, for them, was the capital of the world.
author: Bob Dylan

text: At home we're the hosts, and I never liked the idea of being embarrased in front of our friends.
author: Knute Rockne

text: My favorite show is America's Funniest Home Videos. People will get hit on the head and I feel bad cause I'm laughing my head off!
author: Corbin Bleu

text: I'm like a really goofy home ec teacher.
author: Alton Brown

text: It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.
author: Rumi

text: I'm just like so many women - I was frustrated, I had these white pants that I had spent a lot of money on, and you get home and you think, 'What am I really supposed to wear under this?' So it was a frustrated consumer moment.
author: Sara Blakely

text: I like to feel the butterflies in the stomach, I like to go home and have a restless night and wonder how I'm going to be able to accomplish this feat, get jittery. That hunger and those butterflies in the stomach are very essential for all creative people.
author: Amitabh Bachchan

text: Working in an office with an array of electronic devices is like trying to get something done at home with half a dozen small children around. The calls for attention are constant.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

text: I'm most at home on the stage. I was carried onstage for the first time when I was six months old.
author: Alan Alda

text: I spend plenty of time in London and it doesn't scare me, but it's a lonely place, even if you've got friends there. My job takes me all around the world, meeting lots of interesting people. But I think if I couldn't get home, if I couldn't get back to what I consider my real life I'd be frightened.
author: Shirley Henderson

text: How much a dunce that has been sent to roam, excels a dunce that has been kept at home.
author: William Cowper

text: I really like having a life outside work. I sometimes wish I did more career stuff and was in that Hollywood scene a bit more. But Toronto's my home.
author: Rachel McAdams

text: When I came home for the summer after my first year of college, I told my mother that my best friend and I were driving to California. She laughed out loud - 2,000 miles in a what? Well, my best friend had an old Chevy. What could go wrong?
author: Jane Smiley

text: I feel most at home in the water. I disappear. That's where I belong.
author: Michael Phelps

text: The means of defense against foreign danger historically have become the instruments of tyranny at home.
author: James Madison

text: I never saw film stars at home. We had no maid, no cook, no swimming pool.
author: Natalie Wood

text: With the help of a friend I got father into a wagon, when the crowd had gone. I held his head in my lap during the ride home. I believed he was mortally wounded. He had been stabbed down through the kidneys, leaving an ugly wound.
author: Buffalo Bill

text: We used to go to the pictures every Saturday night but we had to leave a little bit early and get home and watch Match of the Day - and my wife still complains she missed the last five minutes of every film we saw.
author: Brian Clough

text: I am not suggesting that all those missionary organizations working in Haiti should pack up and go home, but I am urging them to understand that Haiti does not need clever Americans with newly contrived schemes for saving their country.
author: Tony Campolo

text: It is often easier to become outraged by injustice half a world away than by oppression and discrimination half a block from home.
author: Carl T. Rowan

text: I go home and don't get treated any differently. People have known me all my life and are interested and very supportive but because they have known me forever I don't get any diva treatment. My mum still tells me off if I haven't loaded the dishwasher for her.
author: Katherine Jenkins

text: One of the great privileges of having grown up in a middle-class literary English household, but having gone to school in the front lines in Southeast London, was that I became half-street-urchin and half-good-boy at home. I knew that dichotomy was possible.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

text: I like making things. I have a wood shop at home. I am a terrible carpenter but I love doing it.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

text: I have a three-year-old and a four-year-old at home, and my mornings are about just dealing with the fact of that. I oddly enjoy it.
author: Damian Lewis

text: Whether you come back by page or by the big screen, Hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home.
author: J. K. Rowling

text: It is easier to take a position in the abstract than when it hits home.
author: Dennis Prager

text: And when the day arrives I'll become the sky and I'll become the sea and the sea will come to kiss me for I am going home. Nothing can stop me now.
author: Trent Reznor

text: I love my parents. But I'm almost 28 and it's not fun to be asked, 'What are you doing today? What do you want for dinner? When are you going to be home?' It just makes you feel like a kid. It's this juxtaposition of feeling annoyed and really lucky to have people who love you so much.
author: Jonah Hill

text: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
author: Eliza Dushku

text: I was making a lot of 8mm home movies, since I was twelve, making little dramas and comedies with the neighborhood kids.
author: Steven Spielberg

text: Today's misery is real unemployment, home foreclosures and bankruptcies. This is the Obama Misery Index and its at a record high. Its going to take more than new rhetoric to put Americans back to work - its going to take a new president.
author: Mitt Romney

text: I have become a queer mixture of the East and the West, out of place everywhere, at home nowhere.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

text: Music is my home.
author: Jennifer Hudson

text: My work in the House of Representatives, at this time in my life, is completed. It is time to return home.
author: J. C. Watts

text: Kindness goes a long ways lots of times when it ought to stay at home.
author: Kin Hubbard

text: Baseball is like driving, it's the one who gets home safely that counts.
author: Tommy Lasorda

text: I remind everyone: Whether you school them at home or send them to school, you as a parent have the responsibility to make sure they learn and behave. Teachers and principals may help, but parents are the ones who must accept responsibility.
author: Ernest Istook

text: General Howard informed me, in a haughty spirit, that he would give my people 30 days to go back home, collect all their stock, and move onto the reservation.
author: Chief Joseph

text: How we are using up our home, how we are living and polluting the planet is frightening. It was evident when I was a child. It's more evident now.
author: Maya Lin

text: When I started editing on my home computer, I said to myself, 'Well, I could be at home studying for a class or I could be at home editing a video.'
author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

text: At home, you always have to be a politician when you're abroad, you almost feel yourself a statesman.
author: Harold MacMillan

text: However, I was a restaurant critic at Chicago magazine before I worked at Esquire, and I've been a really enthusiastic home cook for a long time. It's just something I'm passionate about.
author: Ted Allen

text: I'm lucky because I have a job I love. I really miss being away from home, being in my own bed, seeing my animals and siblings, having my moms cookies. I have a couple cats. I got a kitten about a year ago and now Im going on the road so I wont see him for a while. I feel bad.
author: Michelle Branch

text: As a housewife, I feel that if the kids are still alive when my husband gets home from work, then hey, I've done my job.
author: Roseanne Barr

text: A good wife is someone who thinks she has done everything right: raising the kids, being there for the husband, being home, trying to do it all.
author: Julianna Margulies

text: I want kids to have a chance to dream of becoming something like I did in my life, and when you're living in a home that's dysfunctional and unhealthy that way, you don't dream like that.
author: Picabo Street

text: I only scream and scratch when something's only 'really good' or 'good', I want to be great, or let's go home.
author: Jeremy Renner

text: Reading isn't good for a ballplayer. Not good for his eyes. If my eyes went bad even a little bit I couldn't hit home runs. So I gave up reading.
author: Babe Ruth

text: There are 80 million moms in the United States. Forty million stay at home with their children.
author: Andrew Shue

text: I never would have given up my work to stay home.
author: Shirley MacLaine

text: I didn't really seek attention. I just wanted to play the game well and go home.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

text: Always there has been some terrible evil at home or some monstrous foreign power that was going to gobble us up if we did not blindly rally behind it.
author: Douglas MacArthur

text: Major league baseball has asked its players to stop tossing baseballs into the stands during games, because they say fans fight over them and they get hurt. In fact, the Florida Marlins said that's why they never hit any home runs. It's a safety issue.
author: Jay Leno

text: Never make your home in a place. Make a home for yourself inside your own head. You'll find what you need to furnish it - memory, friends you can trust, love of learning, and other such things. That way it will go with you wherever you journey.
author: Tad Williams

text: I'm launching my own festival in South Wales. It's something I've wanted to do for a long time. It's going to be held at Margam Park, because I wanted the venue to be as close to my home as possible.
author: Katherine Jenkins

text: In all honesty, at that time, I never saw myself as an author... I was just a Mom in a state of panic, trying to enter a short story contest to win the prize money in order to keep the lights on in my home.
author: Leslie Banks

text: If your house is burning, wouldn't you try and put out the fire?
author: Imran Khan

text: Music was my joy, my home, the one place I felt happy and secure.
author: Lawrence Welk

text: All of a sudden to get all of this attention, and to be away from home and working all the time was hard. I was on planes all the time. I didn't see my friends. I cried a lot. It was quite terrifying.
author: Kate Moss

text: Caesar might have married Cleopatra, but he had a wife at home. There's always something.
author: Will Cuppy

text: I'm still really close with everyone at home and their parents - and their brothers and sisters. I was so, so, so lucky to grow up as part of a community and I don't take that for granted. I try very hard to stay part of it.
author: Jennifer Garner

text: My parents were the same in the pulpit as they were at home. I think that's where a lot of preachers' kids get off base sometimes. Because they don't see the same things at both places.
author: Joel Osteen

text: Everybody at home speaks mandarin except me.
author: Rupert Murdoch

text: I should like to know what is the proper function of women, if it is not to make reasons for husbands to stay at home, and still stronger reasons for bachelors to go out.
author: George Eliot

text: Land is the secure ground of home, the sea is like life, the outside, the unknown.
author: Stephen Gardiner

text: When you're safe at home you wish you were having an adventure when you're having an adventure you wish you were safe at home.
author: Thornton Wilder

text: Well, I just said that Jesus and I were both Jewish and that neither of us ever had a job, we never had a home, we never married and we traveled around the countryside irritating people.
author: Kinky Friedman

text: I came from a broken home, so my mom was a major influence in my life.
author: Julius Erving

text: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
author: Robert Frost

text: I exercise at home - light cardio and yoga.
author: Danica McKellar

text: I don't believe in organized religion - I dealt with them hand in hand, and a whole bunch of Catholic priests tried to molest me. Telling me I was gay and I should go home with them and stuff.
author: Jonathan Davis

text: We talk a lot in our home together about where we're going, what I'm doing.
author: Melinda Gates

text: And I came back and it was great, 'cuz George had set up all these flowers all over the studio saying welcome home. So then we got it together again. I always felt it was better on the White one for me. We were more like a band, you know.
author: Ringo Starr

text: The best thing for me is, when I'm not working, is to be at home and to have a script or two scripts is better, and to be just walking around the house and just thinking about the lines.
author: Christopher Walken

text: I have a fantastic studio in my home, and it's my biggest toy. I have about a half a million dollars worth of musical equipment in my house.
author: Antonio Banderas

text: Power doesn't have to be on such a big scale for powerful things to occur. Within your own home, you can be a powerful woman as a mother, influencing your children's lives.
author: Jill Scott

text: I'm not afraid to call a wine that tastes like Skittles or green peppers mixed with orange marmalade. I'll say, 'It tastes like chicken.' I mean, that's not what people think of when they think of wine, but that's what it tastes like to me and it hits home.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

text: A fan sent me a letter and a $10 bill. It's a short letter - all she said was, 'Hey, since it's harder for you to go out these days without getting photographed, here $10 for a pizza.' I was like, 'Aww, she sent me money for a pizza so I could eat at home!'
author: Zac Efron

text: With the theatre, your whole day is geared towards the evening's show, and that's the job. People usually go to work about 9 and come home around 5, or maybe 7.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

text: Christmas... is not an external event at all, but a piece of one's home that one carries in one's heart.
author: Freya Stark

text: Now, I know there are many Americans who say, 'Get out of Afghanistan. Bring 'em all home.' And there are others who say, 'Put in hundreds of thousands of more.'
author: Hillary Clinton

text: Confronting a stadium audience, you can't see the whites of their eyes. It's just an amorphous mass of noise and, of course, you can't see the alleged billions watching at home either, so the degree to which you are intimidated is quite low.
author: Rowan Atkinson

text: We need to rediscover the idea of the common good and work together to build a home.
author: Jonathan Sacks

text: Don't leave home without your sword - your intellect.
author: Alan Moore

text: After spending time with the rescued turkeys at Farm Sanctuary's shelter and seeing how similar they are to my furry companion animals at home, I knew I needed to do everything in my power to protect these friendly and curious birds from the daily pain and suffering they endure on factory farms.
author: Ginnifer Goodwin

text: There's an internal battle. I need to work, I need to work, I need to work and I need to be home with my kids and the kids win.
author: Jennifer Garner

text: I still close my eyes and go home - I can always draw from that.
author: Dolly Parton

text: We have two dogs, Mabel and Wolf, and three cats at home, Charlie, George and Chairman. We have two cats on our farm, Tom and Little Sister, two horses, and two mini horses, Hannah and Tricky. We also have two cows, Holy and Madonna. And those are only the animals we let sleep in our bed.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

text: SNL is a home. You've got all of your brothers and sisters there, and it's a great time.
author: Adam Sandler

text: When I began to make some money, I really wanted to have a home.
author: Paul Theroux

text: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.
author: Elmer Davis

text: Housework is what a woman does that nobody notices unless she hasn't done it.
author: Evan Esar

text: The one thing that offends me the most is when I walk by a bank and see ads trying to convince people to take out second mortgages on their home so they can go on vacation. That's approaching evil.
author: Jeff Bezos

text: I think because my life is so insane and it's constantly going at 120 miles per hour, my favorite thing to do is sit at home in front of the TV and check out.
author: Sean Hayes

text: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: I like spending time at home. In Paris, people drop by and have a bite to eat, or they drop by and watch Friends on TV. I take my dog to the office there, and I walk to work sometimes.
author: Marc Jacobs

text: Never be the only one, except, possibly, in your own home.
author: Alice Walker

text: Basically my wife was immature. I'd be at home in the bath and she'd come in and sink my boats.
author: Woody Allen

text: But as far as Twitter, I'll be in a restaurant and I'll get home and somebody tweeted and they talked about what I ordered and what I was wearing. In some cases, that could be dangerous, because you don't want everybody to know where you are every second of every day.
author: Carrie Underwood

text: He may be president, but he still comes home and swipes my socks.
author: Joseph P. Kennedy

text: My idea of heaven used to be relaxing at home with a cheese plate and champagne.
author: Lea Michele

text: I had only one superstition. I made sure to touch all the bases when I hit a home run.
author: Babe Ruth

text: It's not about finding a home so much as finding yourself.
author: Jason Behr

text: The way to work with a bully is to take the ball and go home. First time, every time. When there's no ball, there's no game. Bullies hate that. So they'll either behave so they can play with you or they'll go bully someone else.
author: Seth Godin

text: Divorce is one of the key predictors of poverty for a child growing up in a home that's broken.
author: Mike Huckabee

text: My home town is very small and very remote and we don't have a movie house.
author: Tommy Lee Jones

text: If eating out, order your meal and ask the server to wrap up half of the portion to take home with your for the next day, keeping your portion size in check, and stretching your dollar into two meals.
author: Cat Cora

text: Africa for the Africans... at home and abroad!
author: Marcus Garvey

text: For target shooting, that's okay. Get a license and go to the range. For defense of the home, that's why we have police departments.
author: James Brady

text: A heart makes a good home for the friend.
author: Yunus Emre

text: Charity begins at home, and justice begins next door.
author: Charles Dickens

text: Yes, I've kissed a lot of guys. I like to kiss, but that's it. I don't go home with anyone. I sleep with my animals, like my baby monkey, Brigitte Bardot.
author: Paris Hilton

text: Human beings are the only creatures on earth that allow their children to come back home.
author: Bill Cosby

text: I have a little kitchen office at home, where I do all my kids' stuff.
author: Katey Sagal

text: I have Social Disease. I have to go out every night. If I stay home one night I start spreading rumors to my dogs.
author: Andy Warhol

text: Let architects sing of aesthetics that bring Rich clients in hordes to their knees Just give me a home, in a great circle dome Where stresses and strains are at ease.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

text: Everywhere you hang your hat is home. Home is the bright cave under the hat.
author: Lance Morrow

text: I think the advent of the Internet gave us all a big boost, because by the time the Internet became mainstream and you could get it in your home, a lot of us were used to dealing in fan culture, writing to magazines or anything at the back of comic books.
author: Kevin Smith

text: However painful the process of leaving home, for parents and for children, the really frightening thing for both would be the prospect of the child never leaving home.
author: Robert Neelly Bellah

text: If my world were to cave in tomorrow, I would look back on all the pleasures, excitements and worthwhilenesses I have been lucky enough to have had. Not the sadness, not my miscarriages or my father leaving home, but the joy of everything else. It will have been enough.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: Where there is a mother in the home, matters go well.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

text: In the theatre, people talk. Talk, talk until the cows come home about journeys of discovery and about what Hazlitt thought of a line of Shakespeare. I can't stand it.
author: Anthony Hopkins

text: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
author: Henny Youngman

text: What the New Yorker calls home would seem like a couple of closets to most Americans, yet he manages not only to live there but also to grow trees and cockroaches right on the premises.
author: Russell Baker

text: Your home is regarded as a model home, your life as a model life. But all this splendor, and you along with it... it's just as though it were built upon a shifting quagmire. A moment may come, a word can be spoken, and both you and all this splendor will collapse.
author: Henrik Ibsen

text: After I hit a home run I had a habit of running the bases with my head down. I figured the pitcher already felt bad enough without me showing him up rounding the bases.
author: Mickey Mantle

text: I would love to have a robot at home.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: I will not have my son grow up in a tension-filled home.
author: Christina Aguilera

text: I came home after a year and although my profession was only hairdressing, I knew I could change it.
author: Vidal Sassoon

text: I grew up in a home environment where I wasn't getting esteem for anything I did.
author: Ben Affleck

text: The fellow that owns his own home is always just coming out of a hardware store.
author: Kin Hubbard

text: I'm still a kid. I'm like six years old. But it's just a matter of wanting to get up, it's just a big journey. I felt like when I left home that I was on a journey, and I still am.
author: Heath Ledger

text: Obviously, the easiest recipes are the most successful when it comes to the home cook, because they're not intimidated by them. If I'm doing 'Boy Meets Grill,' and I do something very simple like grilled hamburgers or steaks or chicken, those are the most sought-after recipes.
author: Bobby Flay

text: It's passionately interesting for me that the things that I learned in a small town, in a very modest home, are just the things that I believe have won the election.
author: Margaret Thatcher

text: If you're a misanthrope you stay at home. There are certain writers who really don't like other people. I'm not like that, I don't think.
author: Paul Theroux

text: The house has to please everyone, contrary to the work of art which does not. The work is a private matter for the artist. The house is not.
author: Adolf Loos

text: I know people that could serve me canned tuna and saltine crackers and have me feel more at home at their table than some people who can cook circles around me. The more you try to impress people, generally the less you do.
author: Alton Brown

text: At home, growing up, we weren't really poor. We had everything we needed, we just didn't have what we wanted.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

text: My wife is the boss at home, and my daughters are the bosses. I am just the worker. We are a very warm family and very happy.
author: Jet Li

text: The people recognize themselves in their commodities they find their soul in their automobile, hi-fi set, split-level home, kitchen equipment.
author: Herbert Marcuse

text: Well, after the divorce, I went home and turned all the lights on!
author: Larry David

text: I've never had WiFi at home. I'm too easily distracted, and YouTube is too tempting.
author: Dave Eggers

text: God the Father, the supreme Architect, had already built this cosmic home we behold, the most sacred temple of His godhead, by the laws of His mysterious wisdom.
author: Giovanni Pico della Mirandola

text: You earn very little money on independent films and I'm the provider for my home, so I do have to think of taking one for the accountant time and again and that means studio pictures.
author: Vera Farmiga

text: You come to work and you laugh all day, you go home and you feel light and there's a certain feeling when you're sitting with the audience and they leave after 90 minutes and it's just pure escapism and they're happy.
author: Gabrielle Union

text: If an ass goes travelling he will not come home a horse.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: If I don't get paid I'm going to take a whole lot of Marshall amps home with me on the plane.
author: Tommy Chong

text: Illogical thinkers throw names and slurs around because they have no arguments with which to rebut their opponents. Rational people have to keep hammering their points home.
author: Benjamin Carson

text: I don't like travelling. Which is ridiculous. And it's not because I'm afraid of dying on the plane or anything. I just like to stay at home.
author: Rachel Weisz

text: When I go on the plane to fly home, I'm literally capable of forgetting what I do for a job. That also comes about because I choose to take massive breaks between projects, and because I choose to do this ridiculous thing of keeping home, home.
author: Eric Bana

text: The first presentation of my show was given in May, 1883, at Omaha, which I had then chosen as my home. From there we made our first summer tour, visiting practically every important city in the country.
author: Buffalo Bill

text: I'm hoping someday that some kid, black or white, will hit more home runs than myself. Whoever it is, I'd be pulling for him.
author: Hank Aaron

text: One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.
author: Margaret Mead

text: Home is one's birthplace, ratified by memory.
author: Henry Anatole Grunwald

text: The most compelling reason for most people to buy a computer for the home will be to link it to a nationwide communications network. We're just in the beginning stages of what will be a truly remarkable breakthrough for most people - as remarkable as the telephone.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Marrying a man is like buying something you've been admiring for a long time in a shop window. You may love it when you get it home, but it doesn't always go with everything else in the house.
author: Jean Kerr

text: If you got a good imagination, a lot of confidence and you kind of know what you are saying, then you might be able to do it. I know a lot of colorful characters at home that would make great actors.
author: Jason Statham

text: Hit a home run - put your head down, drop the bat, run around the bases, because the name on the front is more - a lot more important than the name on the back.
author: Ryne Sandberg

text: I have a life that I enjoy I try and value the things that I think are worth valuing and everything else is icing. You know, it is a kick to go down the red carpet in that dress and then you go back home.
author: Jewel

text: If you're not a competitor, you've just got to go home.
author: Venus Williams

text: To be a queen of a household is a powerful thing.
author: Jill Scott

text: About 15 years ago I went though a period of a year or so when I just couldn't find anything good. My wife noticed I was having trouble reading menus. I bought some cheap reading glasses in a drug store. I got home and suddenly all these books that weren't good were good.
author: Richard Russo

text: My folks were raised pure prohibitionist. They were very good people, with high moral standards - but very repressed. There was no hugging and kissing in my home.
author: Hugh Hefner

text: Child abuse and neglect offend the basic values of our state. We have a responsibility to provide safe settings for at-risk children and facilitate permanent placement for children who cannot return home.
author: Matt Blunt

text: We have to judge politicians by their cumulative score. In one innings they make a great catch, in another they drop the ball. In one they score a home run, in another they strike out. But it is their cumulative batting average that we are interested in.
author: Jesse Jackson

text: Here at home, when Americans were standing in long lines to give blood after the attack on the World Trade Center and the Pentagon, we squandered an obvious opportunity to make service a noble cause again, and rekindle an American spirit of community.
author: Joe Biden

text: I'm a real Suzy Homemaker.
author: Suzy Bogguss

text: I tentatively believe in a god. I was brought up in a fairly religious home. I think the world is compatible with reincarnation, karma, all that stuff.
author: Bjorn Lomborg

text: Nature is the mother and the habitat of man, even if sometimes a stepmother and an unfriendly home.
author: John Dewey

text: I play basketball probably four to five days a week when I'm back home.
author: Josh Hutcherson

text: When my son was born, and after a day of lying-in I was told that I could leave the hospital and take him home, I burst into tears. It wasn't the emotion of the moment: it was shock and horror.
author: Susan Orlean

text: If there were no schools to take the children away from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
author: E. W. Howe

text: To be honest, I find going out pretty scary and intimidating. Got all those people checking you out, with only one purpose: hooking up. I'm quite the dork, I'd rather sit home and play Scrabble. But that doesn't get you a girl, does it?
author: Wentworth Miller

text: The hardest thing is spending twelve hours a day accommodating the rest of the world, then going home at night and criticizing it. I would be curious about what I'd write if I didn't have to worry about offending.
author: Sloane Crosley

text: I consider myself a product of Alaska. The love and the debt that I feel to my home state, you always want your hometown to be the proudest of you.
author: Jewel

text: As much as I would love to be a person that goes to parties and has a couple of drinks and has a nice time, that doesn't work for me. I'd just rather sit at home and read, or go out to dinner with someone, or talk to someone I love, or talk to somebody that makes me laugh.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

text: On Sundays when I speak, I hopefully give somebody something that they can use the next day at work or at home.
author: Joel Osteen

text: Home wasn't built in a day.
author: Jane Sherwood Ace

text: There is something permanent, and something extremely profound, in owning a home.
author: Kenny Guinn

text: From secrecy and deception in high places, come home, America. From military spending so wasteful that it weakens our nation, come home, America.
author: George McGovern

text: Although I have lived in London, I have never really considered London my home because it was always going to be a stopping-off point for me, and it has been too.
author: Annie Lennox

text: It's a miracle was the last track recorded for the album, we based it on the rhythm from the middle of 'Late Home Tonight, where there's Graham Broad playing lots and lots of drums with me shouting in the background, pretending to be a mad Arab leader.
author: Roger Waters

text: A man travels the world in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
author: George Edward Moore

text: In Afghanistan, there is a plan to build democracy hundreds of thousands of troops are protecting it. There is a plan to rebuild and reconstruct there. But many thousands of Americans die from violence and poverty every year and we don't have a plan for reconstruction at home.
author: Jesse Jackson

text: Seek home for rest, for home is best.
author: Thomas Tusser

text: No, I can tell you one of the first things that happens to a home secretary when they arrive in the job is that they are given a briefing about the security matters that they will be dealing with and I deal with security matters on a daily basis.
author: Theresa May

text: Just take the ball and throw it where you want to. Throw strikes. Home plate don't move.
author: Satchel Paige

text: When we started the show, 'Dallas' was known as the city where JFK was assassinated. By the end it was known as JR's home town.
author: Larry Hagman

text: Well, look at what people are doing for returned veterans now. The wounded warriors. They're working hard to make the wounded veterans feel that they are loved and welcomed home, unlike Vietnam. It was not a very kind, gentle world then. I think we are kinder and gentler.
author: Barbara Bush

text: I usually write away from home, in coffee shops, on trains, on planes, in friends' houses. I like places where there's stuff going on that you can lift your eyes, see something interesting, overhear a conversation.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

text: When I go home, its an easy way to be grounded. You learn to realize what truly matters.
author: Tony Stewart

text: It's not like I'm this glamour diva who hands everything over and I just sit on my throne at home.
author: Heidi Klum

text: This whole head of the home thing has been blown way out of proportion. Some guys just take it way too far. Some parents take it way too far. Yet children need guidance. They need a parent to help and guide them. They also need a friend. They need a confidant.
author: Donny Osmond

text: My divorce came to me as a complete surprise. That's what happens when you haven't been home in eighteen years.
author: Lee Trevino

text: I was brought up in a household of chaos and I never felt stable at home.
author: Christina Aguilera

text: I have this extraordinary life during the day, and then I get to come home to my sweet husband who loves to cook with me. I have a nice glass of wine, he has some scotch, we chat, we cook, and we hang out with the dog. I have an absolute dream life.
author: Rachael Ray

text: It's a sad day when the leaders of the free world engage in such deception and trickery. I voted against this unnecessary war and will continue to argue that the best way to support our troops is to bring them home.
author: Major R. Owens

text: My first holiday to San Francisco in 1998-99 was supposed to be a two-week vacation but I ended up staying five weeks and nearly didn't come home.
author: Johnny Vegas

text: The only foes that threaten America are the enemies at home, and these are ignorance, superstition and incompetence.
author: Elbert Hubbard

text: Home life is no more natural to us than a cage is natural to a cockatoo.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: The worst feeling in the world is the homesickness that comes over a man occasionally when he is at home.
author: E. W. Howe

text: When we root-root-root for the home team, we're rooting for our home as much as the team.
author: Richard Roeper

text: I don't need to be asking for money for local museums and other projects just to make me look good back home.
author: Jim DeMint

text: Don't kid yourself. President Obama's decision to withdraw 33,000 troops from Afghanistan before he stands for reelection is not driven by the United States' 'position of strength' in the war zone as much as it is by grim economic and political realities at home.
author: Ron Fournier

text: Here's how I think of my money - as soldiers - I send them out to war everyday. I want them to take prisoners and come home, so there's more of them.
author: Kevin O'Leary

text: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
author: Confucius

text: A happy home is one in which each spouse grants the possibility that the other may be right, though neither believes it.
author: Don Fraser

text: I take my children everywhere, but they always find their way back home.
author: Robert Orben

text: I left home because I was hungry.
author: Red Skelton

text: But inspiration? - That's when you come home from abroad and are asked: Well, have you found inspiration? - and fortunately you haven't. But the impressions sink in, of course, and may emerge later: None of us has invented the house that was done many thousands of years ago.
author: Arne Jacobsen

text: But Vegas is really my first home.
author: David Copperfield

text: I think it's really important to give yourself a very big question that you're working on that you can come home to, even if you, you know, are going to have to go without a cup of coffee or even a meal, that that should nourish you.
author: Anna Deavere Smith

text: When I'm at home in Virginia, I become more hermit-like. I like my own home.
author: Robert Duvall

text: When I was younger, my coach, Liang Chow, made all the decisions. I would go to the gym for practice, do exactly what Chow told me to do, go home, come back and start all over again. If Chow told me to do 50 squat jumps, I did 50 squat jumps.
author: Shawn Johnson

text: After hundreds of auditions and nothing, you're sitting home and wondering, 'What am I doing?'
author: Demi Lovato

text: For my wrap present, Colin Farrell gave me a first edition book. I got so involved with this character and I was so sad when the movie was over that when I got home and I tried to read the book I got really emotional and I started crying.
author: Salma Hayek

text: I have two homes in Malibu, a home in Canada that I'm building, and I just love pouring my heart out into this part of my life.
author: Pamela Anderson

text: Why should people go out and pay money to see bad films when they can stay at home and see bad television for nothing?
author: Samuel Goldwyn

text: He that loves not his wife and children feeds a lioness at home, and broods a nest of sorrows.
author: Jeremy Taylor

text: Atlanta's my musical home. It really was the place where I really came alive.
author: John Mayer

text: The best thing that ever happened to me is that nothing happened in writing. I ended up working for engineering companies, and that's where I found my material, in the everyday struggle between capitalism and grace. Being broke and tired, you don't come home your best self.
author: George Saunders

text: I'm always amazed when a pitcher becomes angry at a hitter for hitting a home run off him. When I strike out, I don't get angry at the pitcher, I get angry at myself. I would think that if a pitcher threw up a home run ball, he should be angry at himself.
author: Willie Stargell

text: Children who cling to parents or who don't want to leave home are stunted in their emotional, psychological growth.
author: Dirk Benedict

text: People internalize, from the jail to student loan debt, to credit card debt, to unemployment to the whole collective. It manifests itself in many ways, in people's home lives, domestic stuff.
author: Jesse Jackson

text: The only place I've felt was really my home is my cabin up north. There's something in the water there that connects me to that place. There's also this sense of isolation and loneliness about it that I've never been able to shake.
author: Jessica Lange

text: I got a telegraph from my mother who said that my step-father had had a heart attack, come home and earn a living. So I went back to England and the only thing I knew to earn any cash was through hairdressing.
author: Vidal Sassoon

text: One never reaches home, but wherever friendly paths intersect the whole world looks like home for a time.
author: Hermann Hesse

text: If you don't quit, and don't cheat, and don't run home when trouble arrives, you can only win.
author: Shelley Long

text: You come home, and you party. But after that, you get a hangover. Everything about that is negative.
author: Mike Tyson

text: I am at home in many cultures. I live actively in three continents and I've done that for most of my life, so I just make films as I see the world, and that happens to speak to people. I do things that I want to do.
author: Mira Nair

text: Having robbed children of any sense that their Father is in Heaven and that they are His creation, we then launched an experiment in raising them without earthly fathers too. Having neither a Father in heaven or a father in the home, many young men make gangs their families.
author: Gary Bauer

text: In our home there was always prayer - aloud, proud and unapologetic.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

text: I am not quite sure where home is right now. I do have places in London and Milan, and a house in Spain. I guess I would say home is where my mother is, and she lives in Spain.
author: Sarah Brightman

text: I went to the store and bought lady fingers, when I got home I noticed one of the fingers was missing so I went back to the store and the manager was nice enough to give me the finger.
author: Jay London

text: I could lie and say my wife cooks for me, but she doesn't. My wife has never learnt cooking but she has great cooks at home.
author: Shahrukh Khan

text: There are times when I'm driving home after a day's shooting, thinking to myself, That scene would've been so much better if I had written it out.
author: Larry David

text: When I make a film I'm away from home for two to three months. So I want my kids to look at my films one day and say, I love his movies, I love his choices-because he loved them.
author: Kevin Costner

text: At home in Victoria, we have three dogs, Tosh and Lucy, they're half Blue Heelers, and then there's Torrin a little Maltese terrier. She gets more attention in the house than anyone else! Yes, I miss them a lot.
author: Chris Hemsworth

text: When it comes to developing character strength, inner security and unique personal and interpersonal talents and skills in a child, no institution can or ever will compare with, or effectively substitute for, the home's potential for positive influence.
author: Stephen Covey

text: My restless, roaming spirit would not allow me to remain at home very long.
author: Buffalo Bill

text: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
author: Matsuo Basho

text: Basically, I believe the world is a jungle, and if it's not a bit of a jungle in the home, a child cannot possibly be fit to enter the outside world.
author: Bette Davis

text: My home is in Heaven. I'm just traveling through this world.
author: Billy Graham

text: Family makes a house a home.
author: Jennifer Hudson

text: It began to dawn on me that perhaps my country needed me more at home than overseas.
author: Larry David

text: The environment doesn't change that radically. You are still going to go home at night and NBC is going to be there, ABC and CBS will still be there.
author: Dick Wolf

text: I do not recall a Jewish home without a book on the table.
author: Elie Wiesel

text: But if there's an erosion at home, you know, Thomas Jefferson warned about a tyranny of an oligarchy and if we surrender our democracy to the tyranny of an oligarchy, we've made a terrible mistake.
author: Pat Robertson

text: I had no books at home. I started to frequent a public library in Lisbon. It was there, with no help except curiosity and the will to learn, that my taste for reading developed and was refined.
author: Jose Saramago

text: Charity begins at home, but should not end there.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: When I think about the songs I might record, I ask myself, 'Can I picture anybody I know back home sitting in their truck cranking this up?'
author: Blake Shelton

text: More than anything else, I want the folks back at home to think right of me.
author: Elvis Presley

text: Men can have a huge turnover of sponsorship and still survive a lot better than the women. But the women's ratings are better, at least at home in the United States than in the men's tennis.
author: Billie Jean King

text: The thing about being at home versus being out in the world working is, it's a whole different vibe. When I'm home with my kids and partner, I will cook - even though she's a very good cook. She's learned over the years. We started with basics, you know, how to saute onions, how to saute mushrooms.
author: Cat Cora

text: I like being at home and cooking.
author: Shania Twain

text: Women are oppressed in the east, in the west, in the south, in the north. Women are oppressed inside, outside home, a woman is oppressed in religion, she is oppressed outside religion.
author: Taslima Nasrin

text: By the time I got home at night, my eyes were so chlorinated I saw rings around every light.
author: Esther Williams

text: All philosophies, if you ride them home, are nonsense, but some are greater nonsense than others.
author: Samuel Butler

text: The first time that you escape from home or the small town that you live in - there's a reason a small town is called a small town: It's because not many people want to live there.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

text: Going home must be like going to render an account.
author: Joseph Conrad

text: I'd rather rot on my own floor than be found by a bunch of bingo players in a nursing home.
author: Florence King

text: On my visits back home, if they saw that I was getting a big head, they'd let me know right away.
author: John Ratzenberger

text: I've been thinking a lot about next year, which will be the first time in 25 years that I don't have a child at home.
author: Jessica Lange

text: I came home every Friday afternoon, riding the six miles on the back of a big mule. I spent Saturday and Sunday washing and ironing and cooking for the children and went back to my country school on Sunday afternoon.
author: Ida B. Wells

text: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
author: Maya Angelou

text: The thing is, I have a zillion apps, and I'm always looking for the perfect arrangement for them, so scrambling my home screen is part of that eternal quest.
author: Susan Orlean

text: I suppose I could have stayed home and baked cookies and had teas.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: A man's home may seem to be his castle on the outside inside is more often his nursery.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

text: Home is where the heart is.
author: Pliny the Elder

text: The curious are always in some danger. If you are curious you might never come home.
author: Jeanette Winterson

text: I know this sounds generic, but I'm so happy to be home with my husband, my family, and my dog.
author: Fergie

text: I report to you that our country is challenged at home and abroad: that it is our will that is being tried and not our strength our sense of purpose and not our ability to achieve a better America.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

text: I still watch 'Idol,' and it's still the No. 1 show, so obviously I'm not the only one who loves to sit at home and be entertained.
author: Kelly Clarkson

text: I met a lot of great people in Saudi Arabia and I'd like to see them again. And I'd love to spend more time in the desert and in the mountains. I felt really at home there.
author: Dave Eggers
